data.title: Ruth A. Martin
data.meta_description: FRANKFORT – Ruth Ann Martin, 57, died after a long illness March 30, 2015, at a Brewer health care facility. She was born December 15, 1957, in Bangor. In
data.text:
FRANKFORT – Ruth Ann Martin, 57, died after a long illness March 30, 2015, at a Brewer health care facility. She was born December 15, 1957, in Bangor.

In addition to her parents, Ruth was predeceased by a sister and a brother. She is survived by her devoted husband, Scott Martin; her beloved daughters, Melissa Hancock, her husband, Jason, and their daughters, Emma and Riley, and Jennifer Ginn, her husband, Corey, and their children, Tyler, Josh, Ethan, Madison, Eric, Lanah, Sophie, and Noah; 2 stepsons, Scott Martin, Jr. and his son ,Kaiden, and James Martin and his wife, Sam, and their daughters, Harper, Willow, Charlie, and Luna; 9 brothers, 2 sisters, and their spouses; and many nieces, nephews, great nieces and great nephews, and cousins.

A memorial service will be held at 1PM Saturday, April 11, 2015, at the Hampden-Gilpatrick Chapel of Brookings-Smith, 45 Western Ave., Hampden, with Pastor Steve Nute officiating. Those who wish to remember Ruth in a special way may make gifts in her memory to the Salvation Army, 65 South Park St., Bangor, ME 04401. Condolences to the family may be expressed at www. BrookingsSmith.com.
